org.apache.archiva.repository.storage

Class StorageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.storage.StorageUtil

  • public class StorageUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for assets. Allows to copy, move between different storage instances and recursively consume the tree.
    Author:
    Martin Stockhammer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  StorageUtil.PathInformation

        public StorageUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • copyAsset

        public static final void copyAsset(StorageAsset source,
                                   StorageAsset target,
                                   boolean locked,
                                   CopyOption... copyOptions)
                            throws IOException
        Copies the source asset to the target. The assets may be from different RepositoryStorage instances. If you know that source and asset are from the same storage instance, the copy method of the storage instance may be faster.
        Parameters:
        source - The source asset
        target - The target asset
        locked - If true, a readlock is set on the source and a write lock is set on the target.
        copyOptions - Copy options
        Throws:
        IOException

      • moveAsset

        public static final void moveAsset(StorageAsset source,
                                   StorageAsset target,
                                   boolean locked,
                                   CopyOption... copyOptions)
                            throws IOException
        Moves a asset between different storage instances. If you know that source and asset are from the same storage instance, the move method of the storage instance may be faster.
        Parameters:
        source - The source asset
        target - The target asset
        locked - If true, a lock is used for the move operation.
        copyOptions - Options for copying
        Throws:
        IOException - If the move fails

      • recurse

        public static final void recurse(StorageAsset baseAsset,
                                 Consumer<StorageAsset> consumer,
                                 boolean depthFirst,
                                 int maxDepth)
                          throws IOException
        Runs the consumer function recursively on each asset found starting at the base path
        Parameters:
        baseAsset - The base path where to start search
        consumer - The consumer function applied to each found asset
        depthFirst - If true, the deepest elements are consumed first.
        maxDepth - The maximum depth to recurse into. 0 means, only the baseAsset is consumed, 1 the base asset and its children and so forth.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • recurse

        public static final void recurse(StorageAsset baseAsset,
                                 Consumer<StorageAsset> consumer,
                                 boolean depthFirst)
                          throws IOException
        Runs the consumer function recursively on each asset found starting at the base path. The function descends into maximum depth.
        Parameters:
        baseAsset - The base path where to start search
        consumer - The consumer function applied to each found asset
        depthFirst - If true, the deepest elements are consumed first.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • recurse

        public static final void recurse(StorageAsset baseAsset,
                                 Consumer<StorageAsset> consumer)
                          throws IOException
        Runs the consumer function recursively on each asset found starting at the base path. It does not recurse with depth first and stops only if there are no more children available.
        Parameters:
        baseAsset - The base path where to start search
        consumer - The consumer function applied to each found asset
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteRecursively

        public static final void deleteRecursively(StorageAsset baseDir)
                                    throws IOException
        Deletes the given asset and all child assets recursively.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - The base asset to remove.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getExtension

        public static final String getExtension(StorageAsset asset)
        Returns the extension of the name of a given asset. Extension is the substring after the last occurence of '.' in the string. If no '.' is found, the empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        asset - The asset from which to return the extension string.
        Returns:
        The extension.

      • copyToLocalFile

        public static final void copyToLocalFile(StorageAsset asset,
                                         Path destination,
                                         CopyOption... copyOptions)
                                  throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static final StorageUtil.PathInformation getAssetDataAsPath(StorageAsset asset)
                                                            throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
